title: Flashâ€™s Theme
lyrics:
[Chorus: Freddie Mercury, Brian May & Roger Taylor]
Flash, ah
Saviour of the universe
Flash, ah
He'll save every one of us
[Skit: Dale]
Seemingly, there is no reason for these extraordinary intergalactical upsets
 (
Hahahahahahaha
)
What's happening, Flash?
Only Doctor Hans Zarkov, formerly at NASA, has provided any explanation
[Chorus: Freddie Mercury, Brian May & Roger Taylor]
Flash, ah
He's a miracle
This morning's unprecedented solar eclipse is no cause for alarm
Flash, ah
King of the impossible
[Verse 1: Freddie Mercury, 
Brian May & Roger Taylor
]
He's for every one of us
Stand for every one of us
(
Oh
) He saves with a mighty hand
Every man, every woman, every child, it's the mighty flash (
Oh
)
[Skit: General Kala]
General Kala, Flash Gordon approaching
What do you mean Flash Gordon approaching? Open fire! All weapons! Dispatch war rocket Ajax to bring back his body

[Chorus: Freddie Mercury, Brian May & Roger Taylor]
Flash, ah
Gordon's alive
Flash, ah
He'll save every one of us
[Bridge: Freddie Mercury, 
Freddie Mercury & Brian May
]
Just a man with a man's courage
You know he's nothin' but a man
And he can never fail
No one but the pure at heart
May find the
 Golden Grail
Oh, oh
[Skit: Dale]
Flash, Flash, I love you, but we only have fourteen hours to save the Earth
[Outro: Freddie Mercury, Brian May & Roger Taylor]
Flash
